summary: This document is a Court of Appeals notification regarding the filing of a Notice of Criminal Appeal by Jeffrey Epstein in case 19-2221. It includes email correspondence between legal staff discussing scheduling and filing requirements for the appeal.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant filing a criminal appeal in case 19-2221, United States of America v. Epstein.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Listed as an attorney of record to receive electronic notices for the appeal; email address provided.

connections.description: Weingarten is listed as an attorney of record receiving notices for Epstein's criminal appeal.

events.title: Notice of Criminal Appeal Filed
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein files a Notice of Criminal Appeal in the 2nd Circuit Court of Appeals, case number 19-2221.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein filed a Notice of Criminal Appeal on July 23, 2019, in the 2nd Circuit Court of Appeals (case 19-2221).
Reid Weingarten is identified as an attorney of record for the appeal, with email notifications being sent to him.
The document includes internal email correspondence from July 24-26, 2019, regarding scheduling and filing requirements for the appeal brief and response.
The appeal is related to the district court case 19-cr-490, United States of America v. Epstein.
